headline: Memorials Tell  New Stories, With His Help
abstract: Using video projections, the artist Krzysztof Wodiczko reclaims public spaces for marginalized viewpoints.
lead_paragraph: Long before monuments were generating debates, protests and headlines over what and who should be commemorated, the Polish-born conceptual artist Krzysztof Wodiczko was broadening the scope of what memorials around the world could be, taking them well beyond their makersâ€™ intentions.
